author: heyjeySigma

text:
This game is Shadow Hearts Covenant, which is the 2nd in the series (3 total). Covenant is probably in my top 3 RPGs in the last generation so yeah, I absolutely loved it. Playing the first SH before is a good idea as well since Covenant is a direct sequel story-wise, though you can perfectly enjoy Covenant without having played it.

I recommend this game to any RPG fan.
